chinese: 誰謂河廣、一葦杭之。誰謂宋遠、跂予望之。
english: Who says that the He is wide?With [a bundle of] reeds I can cross it.Who says that Song is distant?On tiptoe I can see it.

chinese: 誰謂河廣、曾不容刀。誰謂宋遠、曾不崇朝。
english: Who says that the He is wide?It will not admit a little boat.Who says that Song is distant?It would not take a whole morning to reach it.
